turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. Can I get you to place me an order with Bella Luna Pizzeria?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I wanted three large pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, and what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: On the first one, I would like cheese and pepperoni.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: On the second one, I would like a Veggie Lovers pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And on the 3rd I would like mushrooms and black olives.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 3 large pizzas, one pepperoni, one veggie lovers, and one mushroom and olives, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your total will be $72, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could you make it with gluten-free crust? Does that change the price?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes, i can add gluten free crust but they charge and additional $1 for each pizza bringing the total to $75, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i'll add that to the order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and will you be dining in, picking up, or having it delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll pick it up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 35 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, that's great. Thank you so much for your help today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your welcome, enjoy your pizzas.
